extensionDescription.message: Adds the ability to easily download Opencast videos in RWTHmoodle.

unknownTitle.description: Placeholder for video title when unknown.

noVideoFound.description: Error message when no video is detected.

infoMessage.message: If the video is not properly recognized, try reloading the page.
